mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE `KDI_LINK_SERVICE` ( `svc_id` numeric NOT NULL, `ds_nm` varchar2(100) NOT NULL, `svc_nm` varchar2(100) NULL, `svc_type` char(1) NULL, `reg_id` varchar2(20) NULL, `reg_dt` date NULL, `mod_id` varchar2(20) NULL, `mod_dt` date NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`svc_id`) )
mapper.select: SELECT rownum as NO,* FROM KDI_LINK_SERVICE
